about_the_game:
A collection of songs you can play as background music while playing the game, including the main theme song to One Piece.

Song Title/Artist
We Are!/Hiroshi KITADANI
Believe/Folder 5
Hikari E/The Babystars
BON VOYAGE!/BON-BON BLANCO
Kokoro no Chizu/BOYSTYLE
We Are! & Straw Hat Pirates Ver./7 Straw Hat Pirate Crew
Jungle P/5050
We Go!/Hiroshi KITADANI
HANDS UP!/Kota SHINZATO
Wake up!/AAA
We Can!/Kishidan & Hiroshi Kitadani
Dear friends/TRIPLANE
Horizon Knot/TRIPLANE
Family/7 Straw Hat Pirate Crew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
